questions.question: What is the dominant color of the outer frame encasing the artwork?
What is the overall shape of the framed piece?
What material appears to constitute the outer frame?
What is the primary color of the inner mat surrounding the print?
What is the color of the text printed on the artwork?
Describing the font style used for the message on the print, is it serif or sans-serif?
What is the background color of the printed message on the inner artwork?
What is the texture of the outer frame, is it smooth or rough?
Considering the paper, does the artwork appear to be matte or glossy?
Considering the appearance, what is the apparent thickness of the outer frame?
What is the overall style of the artwork, modern or vintage?
Focusing on the message, how many lines of text are visibly present?
What is the visual characteristic of the frame's edges, sharp or rounded?
Regarding the inner mat, is its width uniform or variable around the print?
What is the overall visual aesthetic conveyed by the piece, minimal or complex?
